messages.message:
I would prefere to have not only a list of the managers of a group, but as well a list of all members.
Its in the Create Deployment - Create Review Queue
I wonder if we can use the group hover card that you see in a couple of places here @jack.robbins @Jianqi Xing @Udit
We already use the group hover card when we're selecting a group. Should we have a UI like this in the modal always based on what group is currently selected?

if a user mouses over the selected group - I think that'd work. It could get a bit cluttered if we always display all users though.

In this context we're helping them determine if they've selected the right group, especially if many have similar names. They'll get that at a glance here, and also have the ability to open the full list using the More info CTA.
